verses.text: \w To|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* himself, understanding. Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* whose sins are covered.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* man \w to|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H0408"\w* imputed sin, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* whose spirit \w there|strong="H5769"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* guile.

\w Because|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* silent \w my|strong="H1961"\w* bones grew old; whilst \w I|strong="H1961"\w* cried \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* day \w long|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* day \w and|strong="H8034"\w* night thy hand \w was|strong="H8034"\w* heavy upon \w me|strong="H5148"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am turned \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* anguish, whilst \w the|strong="H3588"\w* thorn \w is|strong="H8034"\w* fastened.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* acknowledged \w my|strong="H3318"\w* sin \w to|strong="H3318"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* injustice \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w concealed|strong="H2934"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7568"\w* confess against myself \w my|strong="H3318"\w* injustice \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* thou hast forgiven \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H4581"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* sin.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* every \w one|strong="H0410"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* holy pray \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* seasonable time. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flood \w of|strong="H3068"\w* many waters, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* not come nigh unto \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

Thou art \w my|strong="H8104"\w* refuge \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* trouble which hath encompassed \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w my|strong="H8104"\w* joy, deliver \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* surround \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H8055"\w* thee understanding, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w instruct|strong="H3045"\w* thee \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* way, \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt go: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* fix \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H8055"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* thee.

\w Do|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* become \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* horse \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* mule, \w who|strong="H5975"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* understanding. \w With|strong="H3027"\w* bit \w and|strong="H3027"\w* bridle bind fast \w their|strong="H5975"\w* \w jaws|strong="H3027"\w*, \w who|strong="H5975"\w* come \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w near|strong="H3808"\w* unto thee.

Many \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* scourges \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sinner, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* encompass \w him|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hopeth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3588"\w* glad \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* rejoice, ye just, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* glory, \w all|strong="H3615"\w* ye right \w of|strong="H8141"\w* heart.
